value:
Title page to vol. 3 reads: "The revolutions of Persia: containing the reign of Shah Sultan Hussein, with the invasion of the Afghans, ... ".
Title page to vol. 4 reads: "The revolutions of Persia: containing the history of the celebrated usurper Nadir Kouli, ...".
Illustrated with engraved plates and head-pieces depicting scenes and monuments described in the text, and engraved maps and charts; some signed: "I. Gibson sculp".
Old classmark: 636.
Binding: full calf, border (triple g. fillet); spine & board edges g.t., border g.t. on inside covers, raised bands, g. lettering on black spine labels; marbled e.p.; a.e.g.

An historical account of the British trade over the Caspian Sea: with a journal of travels from London through Russia into Persia; and back again through Russia, Germany and Holland. : To which are added, the revolutions of Persia during the present century, with the particular history of Nadir Kouli. In four volumes. ... / By Jonas Hanway, merchant..
4 v in 3 ([19] leaves of plates, [9] folded leaves of plates) : ill, maps ; 27cm (4to).
